description:
Senpai should be studying for midterms, but he’s hooked on a game. Questions arise about what might happen if he were to flunk. Senpai and Nagatoro play rock-paper-scissors to see who has to carry their bags home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On va au festival ? / On dirait un rencard / On rentre ?
Senpai, Omatsuri Ikimasenka? / Date Mitaissu ne, Senpai / Kaerimashou, Senpai
Senpai, Want to Go to the Festival? / It`s Like a Date, Huh, Senpai? / Let`s Go Home, Senpai
センパイ, お祭り行きませんか? / デートみたいっすね, センパイ♥ / 帰りましょう, センパイ
